blogPost.title: Joshua Bellamy, a former New York Jets player who fraudulently obtained more than $1.2 million in Covid relief money and spent tens of thousands of dollars of it on luxury items, has been sentenced to about three years in prison. https://t.co/hcfaMvme3s
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: New prescription eye drops can help users see up close without affecting their long-range vision — and may mean they can ditch their reading glasses for a few hours. https://t.co/w5B2HkjOe7

localize.full_text: 新しい処方箋点眼薬は、遠距離の視力に影響を与えることなく近くを見るのを助ける。そして、数時間老眼鏡を捨てることができるかもしれない。https://t.co/w5B2HkjOe7
新的处方眼药水可以帮助使用者看清近处，而不影响他们的远距离视力--这可能意味着他们可以抛弃几个小时的阅读眼镜。https://t.co/w5B2HkjOe7
新的處方眼藥水可以幫助使用者看清近處，而不影響他們的遠距離視力--這可能意味着他們可以拋棄幾個小時的閱讀眼鏡。https://t.co/w5B2HkjOe7
